definition: lit. not to change, despite repeated admonition/incorrigible/unrepentant

sentences.english: Of course, if incorrigible, we will have the appropriate punishment.
sentences.chinese: 當然，如果屢教不改，我們將會有相應的處罰。

sentences.english: The public was outraged when the vardened criminal was released from prison.
sentences.chinese: 那個屢教不改的慣犯從監獄裏釋放時，公衆感到憤慨。

sentences.english: If you slacked consistently, you could be thrown overboard.
sentences.chinese: 如果你屢教不改老偷懶，你可能會被活活扔到海里。
